android.car.hardware.power

类 CarPowerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.hardware.power.CarPowerManager

  • public class CarPowerManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API to receive power policy change notifications.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarPowerManager.CarPowerPolicyListener
      Listeners to receive power policy change.
      static interface  CarPowerManager.CarPowerState 
      static interface  CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener
      Applications set a CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener for power state event updates.
      static interface  CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion
      Applications set a CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion for power state event updates where a CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture is used.
      static interface  CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture
      An interface passed from CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int STATE_HIBERNATION_ENTER
      Power state to represent the system enters hibernation (suspend to disk) state.
      static int STATE_HIBERNATION_EXIT
      Power state to represent the system wakes up from hibernation.
      static int STATE_INVALID
      Power state to represent the current one is unavailable, unknown, or invalid.
      static int STATE_ON
      Power state to represent the system is at on state.
      static int STATE_POST_HIBERNATION_ENTER
      Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to enter hibernation and the device is about to hibernate.
      static int STATE_POST_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
      Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to shutdown and the device is about to power off.
      static int STATE_POST_SUSPEND_ENTER
      Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to enter deep sleep and the device is about to sleep.
      static int STATE_PRE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE
      Power state to represent system shutdown is initiated, but output components such as display is still on.
      static int STATE_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED
      Power state to represent shutdown is cancelled, returning to normal state.
      static int STATE_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
      Power state to represent the system enters shutdown state.
      static int STATE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE
      Power state to represent the system is getting ready for shutdown or suspend.
      static int STATE_SUSPEND_ENTER
      Power state to represent the system enters deep sleep (suspend to RAM).
      static int STATE_SUSPEND_EXIT
      Power state to represent the system wakes up from suspend.
      static int STATE_WAIT_FOR_VHAL
      Power state to represent Android is up, but waits for the vendor to give a signal to start main functionality.
      static java.lang.String TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG

      • STATE_INVALID

        public static final int STATE_INVALID
        Power state to represent the current one is unavailable, unknown, or invalid.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_WAIT_FOR_VHAL

        public static final int STATE_WAIT_FOR_VHAL
        Power state to represent Android is up, but waits for the vendor to give a signal to start main functionality.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_SUSPEND_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_SUSPEND_ENTER
        Power state to represent the system enters deep sleep (suspend to RAM).

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for suspend enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_shutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_SUSPEND_EXIT

        public static final int STATE_SUSPEND_EXIT
        Power state to represent the system wakes up from suspend.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_SHUTDOWN_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
        Power state to represent the system enters shutdown state.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for shutdown enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_shutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_ON

        public static final int STATE_ON
        Power state to represent the system is at on state.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE

        public static final int STATE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE
        Power state to represent the system is getting ready for shutdown or suspend. Application is expected to cleanup and be ready to suspend.

        The maximum duration of shutdown preprare is 15 minutes by default, and can be increased by setting maxGarageModeRunningDurationInSecs in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED

        public static final int STATE_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED
        Power state to represent shutdown is cancelled, returning to normal state.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_HIBERNATION_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_HIBERNATION_ENTER
        Power state to represent the system enters hibernation (suspend to disk) state.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for hibernation enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_shutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_HIBERNATION_EXIT

        public static final int STATE_HIBERNATION_EXIT
        Power state to represent the system wakes up from hibernation.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_PRE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE

        public static final int STATE_PRE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE
        Power state to represent system shutdown is initiated, but output components such as display is still on. UI to show a device is about to shutdown can be presented at this state.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for pre shutdown prepare is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_preShutdownPrepareTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_POST_SUSPEND_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_POST_SUSPEND_ENTER
        Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to enter deep sleep and the device is about to sleep.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for post suspend enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_postShutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_POST_SHUTDOWN_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_POST_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
        Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to shutdown and the device is about to power off.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for post shutdown enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_postShutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_POST_HIBERNATION_ENTER

        public static final int STATE_POST_HIBERNATION_ENTER
        Power state to represent car power management service and VHAL finish processing to enter hibernation and the device is about to hibernate.

        In case of using CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion, the timeout for post hibernation enter is 5 seconds by default and can be configured by setting config_postShutdownEnterTimeout in the car service resource.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarPowerManager

        public CarPowerManager(Car car,
                       IBinder service)
        Gets an instance of the CarPowerManager.

        Should not be obtained directly by clients, use Car.getCarManager(String) instead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • requestShutdownOnNextSuspend

        public void requestShutdownOnNextSuspend()
        Requests power manager to shutdown in lieu of suspend at the next opportunity.

      • scheduleNextWakeupTime

        public void scheduleNextWakeupTime(int seconds)
        Schedules next wake up time in CarPowerManagementService.

      • getPowerState

        public int getPowerState()
        Returns the current power state.
        返回:
        One of the values defined in CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener.

      • setListener

        public void setListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                        CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener listener)
        Sets a listener to receive power state changes. Only one listener may be set at a time for an instance of CarPowerManager.

        The listener is assumed to completely handle the onStateChanged before returning.

        参数:
        listener - The listener which will receive the power state change.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When a listener is already set for the power state change.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the given listener is null.

      • setListenerWithCompletion

        public void setListenerWithCompletion(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                      CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion listener)
        Sets a listener to receive power state changes. Only one listener may be set at a time for an instance of CarPowerManager.

        For calls that require completion before continue, we attach a CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture which is being used as a signal that caller is finished and ready to proceed. Once the future is completed, car power management service knows that the application has handled the power state transition and moves to the next state.

        参数:
        listener - The listener which will receive the power state change.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When a listener is already set for the power state change.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the given listener is null.

      • clearListener

        public void clearListener()
        Removes the power state listener.

      • getCurrentPowerPolicy

        public CarPowerPolicy getCurrentPowerPolicy()
        Gets the current power policy.

        The returned power policy has ID of the power policy applied most recently. If no power policy has been applied, the ID is an empty string. Note that enabled components and disabled components might be different from those of the latest power policy applied. This is because the returned power policy contains the current state of all power components determined by applying power policies in an accumulative way.

        返回:
        The power policy containing the latest state of all power components.

      • applyPowerPolicy

        public void applyPowerPolicy(java.lang.String policyId)
        Applies the given power policy.

        Power components are turned on or off as specified in the given power policy. Power policies are defined at /vendor/etc/automotive/power_policy.xml. If the given power policy doesn't exist, this method throws IllegalArgumentException.

        参数:
        policyId - ID of power policy.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if policyId is null.

      • setPowerPolicyGroup

        public void setPowerPolicyGroup(java.lang.String policyGroupId)
        Sets the current power policy group.

        Power policy group defines a rule to apply a certain power policy according to the power state transition. For example, a power policy named "default_for_on" is supposed to be applied when the power state becomes ON. This rule is specified in the power policy group. Many power policy groups can be pre-defined, and one of them is set for the current one using setPowerPolicyGroup.

        参数:
        policyGroupId - ID of power policy group.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if policyGroupId is null.

      • addPowerPolicyListener

        public void addPowerPolicyListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                   CarPowerPolicyFilter filter,
                                   CarPowerManager.CarPowerPolicyListener listener)
        Subscribes to power policy change.

        If the same listener is added with different filters, the listener is notified based on the last added filter.

        参数:
        executor - Executor where the listener method is called.
        listener - Listener to be notified.
        filter - Filter specifying power components of interest.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if executor, listener, or filter is null.

      • removePowerPolicyListener

        public void removePowerPolicyListener(CarPowerManager.CarPowerPolicyListener listener)
        Unsubscribes from power policy change.
        参数:
        listener - Listener that will not be notified any more.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if listener is null.

      • setDisplayPowerState

        public void setDisplayPowerState(int displayId,
                                 boolean enable)
        Turns on or off the individual display.

        Changing the driver display is not allowed.

        参数:
        displayId - ID of the display
        enable - Display power state to set
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - When trying to change the driver display power state.

      • notifyUserActivity

        public void notifyUserActivity(int displayId)
        Notifies that user activity has happened in the given display.
        参数:
        displayId - ID of the display

      • isCompletionAllowed

        public static boolean isCompletionAllowed(int state)
        Returns whether listen completion is allowed for state.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
